# AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.undetermined

**Case**

The app hasn’t requested a person’s permission to add audio to calls.

## Declaration

```swift
case undetermined
```

## Permissions

- **AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.serviceDisabled**: A person disables this service for all apps.
- **AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.granted**: A person grants the app permission to add audio to calls.
- **AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.denied**: A person denies the app permission to add audio to calls.
